Reviews.Title: Cameras and DVR work just fine.  Unable to make it work in my network.
Reviews.Author: Ron Kopicko
Reviews.Content: Have had on-going issues with getting the DVR to communicate either within my network or outside as advertised on a smart phone.  Support at first told me they wouldn't support it and then the next time did.  Still waiting on a call back from their Tier II after a week of following up and being told that I would be responded to in the order received.

ProductInfo.Features:
4 Channel smart DVR with pre-installed 500GB hard drive
Free Night Owl Pro application and CMS software for your PC or Mac
Motion activated push notifications and or email alerts
View, playback and configure your system anywhere in the World from your Smartphone or Tablet
4 x Indoor/Outdoor cameras with 50FT night vision
ProductInfo.Name: Night Owl Security ADV1-44500 4-Channel Security System with 500GB HD with 4 Indoor/Outdoor Cameras and  Pro App (Black)
